title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder, old column names are displayed when the dataset is selected
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, it displays the old column names instead of the aliases set for the columns.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
